code:
// import {$, fadeOut, fadeIn} from 'jquery';
function spawnText(textBlockId){var textClass=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'text';var timeout=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:300;var block=document.getElementById(textBlockId);var blocks=document.getElementsByClassName(textClass);for(var i=0;i<blocks.length;i++){if(blocks[i].classList.contains('fade-in')){blocks[i].classList.add('fade-out');}}setTimeout(function(){block.classList.remove('fade-out');block.classList.remove('instant-fade-out');block.classList.add('fade-in');},timeout);}function despawnText(textBlockId){var block=document.getElementById(textBlockId);block.classList.remove('fade-in');block.classList.add('fade-out');}function despawnAll(){var textClass=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'text';var blocks=document.getElementsByClassName(textClass);for(var i=0;i<blocks.length;i++){blocks[i].classList.add('instant-fade-out');}}export{spawnText,despawnText,despawnAll};
